```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(stringr)
library(lubridate)

elites <- read_excel("Untitled/CPED_V1.0/Full Data.xlsx") %>% 
  select(- X__1)

elites_full <- read_excel("CPED_V1.0/CPED_V1.0/Full Data copy.xlsx")
```

```{r}
elites_full %>% 
  group_by(姓名) %>% 
  count() %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  summarize(av_steps = mean(n))

summary(elites_full)

```
